@description.name: @description
@description.body: Contains methods to compute a position for any object which should be positioned relative to another object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The axis object to use for the horizontal placement

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The axis object to use for the vertical placement

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Specify to which edge of the target object, the object should be attached

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Specify with which edge of the target object, the object should be aligned

@description.name: @description
@description.body: DOM and widget independent method to compute the location of an object to make it relative to any other object.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: size {Map} With the keys width and height of the object to align
@param.description: With the keys width and height of the object to align

@param.name: @param
@param.body: area {Map} Available area to position the object. Has the keys width and height. Normally this is the parent object of the one to align.
@param.description: Available area to position the object. Has the keys width and height. Normally this is the parent object of the one to align.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys left, top, right and bottom.
@param.description: Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys left, top, right and bottom.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: offsets {Map} Map with all offsets for each direction. Comes with the keys left, top, right and bottom.
@param.description: Map with all offsets for each direction. Comes with the keys left, top, right and bottom.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
position {String} Alignment of the object on the target, any of
   "top-left", "top-center", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-center", "bottom-right",
   "left-top", "left-middle", "left-bottom", "right-top", "right-middle", "right-bottom".
@param.description:
Alignment of the object on the target, any of
   "top-left", "top-center", "top-right", "bottom-left", "bottom-center", "bottom-right",
   "left-top", "left-middle", "left-bottom", "right-top", "right-middle", "right-bottom".

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modeX {String} Horizontal placement mode. Valid values are:
  • direct: place the object directly at the given location.
  • keep-align: if parts of the object is outside of the visible area it is moved to the best fitting 'edge' and 'alignment' of the target. It is guaranteed the the new position attaches the object to one of the target edges and that that is aligned with a target edge.
  • best-fit
    • : If parts of the object are outside of the visible area it is moved into the view port ignoring any offset, and position values.
@param.description:
Horizontal placement mode. Valid values are:
  • direct: place the object directly at the given location.
  • keep-align: if parts of the object is outside of the visible area it is moved to the best fitting 'edge' and 'alignment' of the target. It is guaranteed the the new position attaches the object to one of the target edges and that that is aligned with a target edge.
  • best-fit
    • : If parts of the object are outside of the visible area it is moved into the view port ignoring any offset, and position values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modeY {String} Vertical placement mode. Accepts the same values as
   the 'modeX' argument.
@param.description:
Vertical placement mode. Accepts the same values as
   the 'modeX' argument.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with the final location stored in the keys left and top.
@return.description: A map with the final location stored in the keys left and top.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the axis implementation for the given mode

@description.name: @description
@description.body: DOM and widget independent method to compute the location of an object to make it relative to any other object.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: size {Map} With the keys width and height of the object to align
@param.description: With the keys width and height of the object to align

@param.name: @param
@param.body: area {Map} Available area to position the object. Has the keys width and height. Normally this is the parent object of the one to align.
@param.description: Available area to position the object. Has the keys width and height. Normally this is the parent object of the one to align.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: target {Map} Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys left, top, right and bottom.
@param.description: Location of the object to align the object to. This map should have the keys left, top, right and bottom.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: offsets {Map} Map with all offsets for each direction. Comes with the keys left, top, right and bottom.
@param.description: Map with all offsets for each direction. Comes with the keys left, top, right and bottom.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} A map with the final location stored in the keys left and top.
@return.description: A map with the final location stored in the keys left and top.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the position value for the horizontal axis

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the position value for the vertical axis

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property axisX. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #axisX}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property axisX. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #axisX}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property axisX. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #axisX}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property axisY. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #axisY}.

@description.name: @description

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property axisY. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #axisY}.

@description.name: @description

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. @description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property align. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #align}.

@description.body: Sets the user value of the property align. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #align}.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability.
